alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL GILCHRIST... SOUTHWESTERN COLUMBIA AND SOUTHEASTERN SUWANNEE COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Obrien, or 12 miles west of Ichetucknee Spring, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ichetucknee Spring, Fort White, Obrien, Branford, and Hildreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
